item.description:
Let's try a nice Winery something a little Different!!


Mike Proscino, plays piano and sings standards at
Gouveia Vineyards in Wallingford on Saturday, August 8.
Music is 4 pm to 7 pm and this place gets packed on Saturday
afternoons. Bring your own meal or snack; buy wine by the glass or
bottle. The wine is really good stuff. He is the manager's
favorite entertainer (well, according to him). Singalongs
include favorites like "Margaritaville" and "Sweet Caroline."
An alternative to Keys to the City with an older mixed crowd.
item.how_to_find_us: Joanne is the contact person for this event.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Mike Proscino @ Gouveia Vineyards
